## Articles

- [How AI agents will impact the world](https://www.gatesnotes.com/AI-agents): great post from Bill Gates exploring agents and their new place in our world.
- [Langchain expands collaboration with Microsoft](https://blog.langchain.dev/langchain-expands-collaboration-with-microsoft/?utm_source=bensbites&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=daily-digest-microsoft-made-google-sing): so cool to see that open-source LLM tech like langchain can coexist with tech giants like Microsoft.
